name: Area 51: Bunny Sanctuary
description:
A bullet hell where your unstable gun changes attack types every 10 seconds.

Made for Ludum Dare 51 - theme: "every 10 seconds"

By: AmberFallStudio, Qorthos, and Saondberg.

Nearly all art, code, music, and sfx made from scratch in 3 days (except for some fonts and noise for dialogue)
